isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - POWER DISTRIBUTION AND GROUND SYSTEM - OPERATION - IGNITION POWER

svcproc.title: IGNITION POWER
svcproc.para: Battery power from the (B1) battery stud is applied to the common terminal (30) of the ignition relay (462)/R1 and to the key switch "B" terminal. Refer to 12V POWER DISTRIBUTION - IGNITION circuit diagram in CTS-5119W or CTS-5273W. With the key switch in the on position, power from the key switch "I" terminal energizes the ignition relay, applying power to the ignition adapters and fuses. With the key switch in the start or ignition position, power is present at the "I" terminal.
